rules_text:
When Thragtusk enters, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
notes:
Reprint — Replaced Feast of Beasts

Given the Foodstorm cycle is essentially defunct, and we agreed on at least Trialing Thragtusk in the set and in standard, this seemed like a natural swap.
